TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Control de Windows Forms que se puede usar para hospedar un elemento de Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use la control se coloque una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] en su [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control o formulario.Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. Al host una [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlar en un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, use la elemento.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll se instala con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ensamblados.WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. La ubicación predeterminada para el ensamblado es %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. Al host una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento en un formulario Windows Forms, debe asignar el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento a la propiedad.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. Use la propiedad para asignar las asignaciones personalizadas entre un control y sus hospedada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el control para hospedar un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: hospedar un Control compuesto 3D de WPF en formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el control cambia automáticamente de tamaño para mostrar todo su contenido.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: Es si el control ajusta su tamaño al contenido; en caso contrario, es .

span.span: if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BackColorTransparent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el elemento hospedado tiene un fondo transparente.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: Es si el elemento hospedado tiene un fondo transparente; de lo contrario, es .

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El propiedad permite copiar el mapa de bits, lo que permite hospeda elementos para utilizar la transparencia en el contenedor del host.The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. Esto es útil cuando el elemento está por encima de una imagen o un fondo degradado.This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. Por motivos de rendimiento, la propiedad está desactivada de forma predeterminada.For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::UIElement ^ Child { System::Windows::UIElement ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::UIElement ^ value); };

summary.span: Obtiene o establece el elemento hospedado por el control .

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se puede hospedar un único elemento, pero puede tener cualquier número de elementos secundarios.Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el propiedad para asignar una hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: hospedar un Control compuesto 3D de WPF en formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: Es para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Libera inmediatamente todos los recursos del sistema utilizados por el control .

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se llama a este método público `Dispose` método y método.This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` se invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`. invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. Cuando el parámetro `disposing` es `true`, este método libera todos los recursos retenidos por los objetos administrados a los que el control hace referencia.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. Este método invoca al método `Dispose` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: Al reemplazar tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a .

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar , consulte [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: Para obtener más información acerca de y , consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: Ventana de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] que se va a abrir de forma no modal.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: Permite al objeto recibir correctamente los mensajes de teclado cuando se abre de forma no modal en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Llame a la método para reenviar todos los mensajes de teclado cuando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ventana se abre de forma no modal.Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. El método instala un filtro de mensajes en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicación basada en.The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. El filtro reenvía todos los mensajes de teclado cuando la ventana no modal está activa.The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostContainer As Panel
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ HostContainer { System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtiene el contenedor primario del elemento de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] hospedado.

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El contenedor del host es la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , que es el contenedor primario del elemento hospedado.The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. El contenedor del host siempre está en la raíz de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] jerarquía de elementos.The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. Para tener acceso el elemento primario del elemento hospedado, tener acceso a directamente.To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] no procesar el elemento `charCode`, control lo procesa con la método.If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the control processes it with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). El método también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: Al reemplazar en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar al método de la clase base para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: Pinta el fondo del control.

span.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método pinta el fondo del control primario en un HBITMAP fuera de la pantalla.The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. Este mapa de bits se usa como el fondo del elemento hospedado para admitir la transparencia.This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. Este método es compatible con la infraestructura de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] y no está diseñado para utilizarse directamente desde el código.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool ProcessCmdKey (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message msg, System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessCmdKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& msg, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ProcessCmdKey (ByRef msg As Message, keyData As Keys) As Boolean
protected: override bool ProcessCmdKey(System::Windows::Forms::Message % msg, System::Windows::Forms::Keys keyData);

param.name: msg
param.span: que se pasa por referencia y que representa el mensaje de ventana que se va a procesar.

span.span: A , passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

param.name: keyData
param.span: Uno de los valores de que representa la tecla que se va a procesar.

span.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: Procesa una tecla de comando, asegurando que el elemento hospedado tiene oportunidad de controlar el comando antes de que se procese [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normalmente.

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: Es si el carácter es una tecla de método abreviado de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]; de lo contrario, es .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si no se controla un mensaje de tecla por hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, éste se reenvía a la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] clase jerarquía para su procesamiento.If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

permission.span: De plena confianza para el llamador inmediato.

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

returns.span: Es si el carácter es una tecla de método abreviado de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]; de lo contrario, es .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si no se controla un mensaje de tecla por hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, éste se reenvía a la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] clase jerarquía para su procesamiento.If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: Obtiene el mapa de propiedades, que determina cómo la configuración de las propiedades en el control afecta al elemento hospedado de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: que asigna a las propiedades del elemento hospedado de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologías tienen dos modelos de propiedades similares pero diferentes.The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *Asignación de propiedad* admite la interoperación entre las dos arquitecturas.*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el propiedad para traducir el propiedad hospedados [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: propiedades de asignación mediante el ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: para especificar la dirección del control que se va a seleccionar; en caso contrario, .

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: Es para moverse hacia delante en el orden de tabulación; es para moverse hacia atrás en el orden de tabulación.

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: Activa el elemento hospedado.

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método activa el elemento hospedado.The method activates the hosted element. Si existe más de un elemento hospedado, se activa el elemento primero o último, según la `directed` y `forward` parámetros.If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. Las llamadas repetidas a la método no atraviesan los elementos hospedados.Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. Para seleccionar los elementos subsiguientes, llame a la método en el propiedad.To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. Esta implementación reenvía las teclas tab de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
